article_node.title: Johnson and Johnson, WH Smiths and Disney: Trending Stocks
article_node.summary: The brief covers recent earnings and guidance from big‑box retailers Walmart, Home Depot, and Target, noting mixed results and strategic moves such as Walmart’s price‑focus and Target’s CEO change. It highlights the upcoming Jackson Hole symposium where Fed Chair Powell’s remarks could signal future policy direction. Trending tickers include J&J’s U.S. manufacturing expansion, WH Smith’s sharp share drop after an accounting error, and Disney’s launch of an ESPN streaming service. The segment also mentions the Trump administration’s potential stake in Intel as part of the Chips Act.
